title: What is the interpretation of a dream about zombies by senior scientists?

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about zombies: Zombies, but alive, perform unknown actions, including eating people and sucking blood, as a result of black magic. The most important thing that was said about that, we followed that. Interpretations of a dream about zombiesInterpreters say that seeing a zombie in a dream indicates exposure to many dangers and difficulties during this period. If the dreamer saw in a dream that a zombie was chasing him, this shows the suffering of those days from many obstacles. Which will stand before him. As for seeing a zombie in a dream, it indicates the arrival of bad events and the fall of sorrows. Seeing a vampire in a dream indicates serious diseases and suffering from a negative impact on the soul. Also, seeing a zombie in a person’s dream symbolizes entering into a bad emotional relationship. He will suffer from severe pain. If the student sees in a dream that Dracula is following her and grabbing her, this will lead to failure and serious failure that will happen to her in her practical and professional life. As for seeing a married woman who is a vampire in a dream, it symbolizes that she is suffering from marital problems and anxiety about her. Interpretation of a dream about zombies by Ibn Sirin. The respected scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing zombies in a dream indicates many dangers and problems that the dreamer will face. If the fortuneteller sees vampires in a dream, this indicates great difficulties that he will face in the coming days. As for the dreamer who sees zombies In a dream, it symbolizes being exposed to excessive envy or eye injury. Seeing a lady in a dream with zombies catching up with her indicates a serious illness and suffering from the fears that befell her in those days. If a man sees in a dream that he is running away from vampires, this means that he He will get rid of the evil and difficulties that await him. If a young man sees vampires in a dream and runs away from them, this symbolizes repentance of sins and disobedience and returning to God again. If the dreamer sees vampires in a dream, this indicates that he is suffering from psychological problems and constant loneliness. As for seeing a zombie woman in a dream, it indicates the calamities that will befall her and exposure to serious damage in her life. And when the dreamer sees vampires in a dream, It symbolizes putting a lot of effort into useless things. When the dreamer sees in a dream, a zombie is chasing her and she runs away from it, so he promises her to get rid of the worries and difficulties in her life. Also, seeing the dreamer in a dream being attacked and killed by zombies symbolizes escaping from plots and conspiracies in her life. Seeing a woman in a dream with vampires following her means that she will face many future problems and they will affect her. Negatively. title: Interpretation of a doll in a dream Seeing a doll as a child’s toy in a dream

preview.html: The concept of dolls, moving toys, brides, children's toys or cars for singles, married, pregnant, divorced women, and buying new broken toys for a child. The dream of dolls in a dream is one of the interpretations that have many important meanings and connotations that the dreamer must know correctly when he sees them in a dream. Dolls are among the things that are widely present in our public life and symbolize the gifts that we give to our loved ones on a regular basis. Many of us love it and hope to get it, and it takes several different forms, but when we see it in a dream, the mind begins to think about the reason for the vision and the details coming to the dreamer. After that, we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing dolls in a dream for the famous great commentator Ibn Sirin, who interpreted it correctly in his interpretations and books. Interpretation of the doll in a dream The doll in the dream of an unmarried woman shows the purity of her soul and her innocent childhood Playing with dolls shows her need for care from her parents The talking doll is a sign of spiritual and mental balance The doll can be a sign of new friendships in the life of a single woman or her thoughts about marriage As for the doll in a dream, the married woman is a sign of pregnancy, especially if her husband gave it to her, or it can be a harbinger of the achievement of cherished ambitions. In the dream of a pregnant woman, the doll is an indication that she gave birth to a girl, especially if the doll is named after a girl, but if the doll does not have a name, this is its interpretation of the birth of a male child Seeing a doll in the shape of a bear is a strong indication of this person’s need for tenderness or self-control and attention Moving dolls in a dream is an indication that a person is carrying in There are latent talents within him that have not yet appeared, knowing that if he exploits them, he will change his life in a very positive way. Seeing a doll in a man's dream indicates his marriage if he is single. It indicates his intimate relationship with his wife if he is married. It can be a sign of good offspring or comfort after distress. Seeing a talking doll or toy in a dream is a strong indication that the dreamer is allowing someone to control his life and control it in a wrong way that can negatively affect his life. A broken toy predicts calamities or the death of someone close to the fortuneteller. He threw the toy as an indication that the visionary lives in isolation or negative isolation and the uselessness of this person in society or his insignificance and the abundance of his hypocrisy. Playing with dolls is an indication of this person's amusement with worldly pleasures. Buying or giving a doll as a gift is a sign of happiness, good news and achieving the desired goals. Watching dolls and puppets may be associated with panic and intimidation, and in this case seeing them is from Satan. In this case, the person must read the verses of protection from Satan, which are the last three verses of Surat Al-Baqarah and Ayat Al-Kursi. Interpretation The doll in Ibn Sirin's dream The vision of moving dolls in a dream also shows the special abilities that the dreamer possesses in life. Seeing a moving doll in a dream means that the person has a lot of potential and great energy. A moving teddy bear in a dream is evidence of the dreamer's need for emotional self-control and great attention. Buying a

title: What did scientists say about the interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the homeInterpretation of a dream about a black snake in the homeFor a single, married, or pregnant woman, the interpretation and details of the dream vary, but seeing snakes in general indicates hostility and confrontation as well as jealousy.Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of a big black snakeThe dream of a big black snake in a dream represents an enemy It may come from a family or friend who has hatred, jealousy, and hatred but does not show it. The interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house, in bed, that is, in bed, this may indicate the wife’s injustice to her husband, or it may be an indication of bad luck and poverty. Seeing a black snake at the door of the house It indicates the envy of the people of that house, and seeing it in the kitchen indicates insufficient means of living and poor economic conditions. If you cannot escape, it means that you will face problems and severe pain, and torture will make your life difficult and bring you a lot of psychological and physical pain. Chasing a black snake indicates A life without stability and peace, which is characterized by frequent fluctuations and changes from one situation to another. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house Through the site Various, you can interpret a dream about a black snake in the house It is presented with the following phrases: If the snake at the door expresses jealousy, in any case, the black snake takes revenge Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house: A pigeon indicates the presence of enemies in the family, and if it bites it, it will become angry and sad. Seeing a snake in the room indicates an enemy or friend who ignores the dreamer, and killing him will get rid of this enemy. If the snake at the door expresses jealousy, In any case, the black snake takes revenge. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake for a married woman. A black snake in a dream is a vengeful enemy, perhaps a woman seeking slander, gossip, and humiliation in a vision, and harboring hatred, resentment, and hatred. If one of the dreamers kills her, this indicates that her enemy is weak and weak. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake and killing it: Seeing and killing a snake indicates many confrontations in one’s life, in addition to many challenges and conflicts that one intends to recover in his life. If he finds that he is able to kill the snake, this indicates that he has increased his self-confidence and complete courage and defeated all Enemies who offended the pioneer. If the opposite happens and the snake is able to see it, it symbolizes a huge loss and complete failure, unable to achieve the desired goal and experiencing severe pain and suffering. In the same way as before, it can indicate a serious illness that can afflict the person with the vision in The future.Interpretation of a dream about cutting off the head of a black snake. The symbol of beheading symbolizes the call for a comprehensive solution and the desire to get rid of all the problems and differences in the dreamer’s life in a certain, indisputable way. If he is found cutting off his head with a sword, this expresses his hatred for falsehood, and means that he fights those who are hostile to God and innovative. In religion, he stands for the truth. If he cannot cut off the head of the snake, it means that he cannot find a job, suffer a great and unbearable loss, or fall into a well-planned trap.

preview.html: In the following lines, we will learn in detail about the meanings of kohl in a dream from your website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing kohl in a dream for a single girl When a single girl sees in her dream that she is putting black kohl on her eyes. It is a sign that she will find a good job that will help her manage her life. And the single girl who sees eye makeup in a dream and is happy. It is an indication of marrying a righteous and suitable young man, and God knows best. As for the girl who dreams that she is putting green kohl in a dream and putting it in order. It is a sign that she is an organized person and is characterized by intelligence, wisdom and good morals. Seeing white kohl in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates her good morals, good reputation and beautiful biography among people. Ibn Sirin explained seeing kohl with a black kohl pen in the dream of an unmarried girl. It is a sign of hearing good news and food, and God knows best. Or seeing colored kohl in the dream of a girl who has never been married. It is a good omen for happy occasions, and soon marriages. And the girl who sees in a dream that her lover gives her the colon, is a sign that she will marry him and be Happy. And when you see buying kohl in a dream, this indicates the success that the girl will achieve in her academic life. And if the single girl sees that she was putting kohl, but her appearance was not good. It is a metaphor for committing sins and transgressions, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about drawing an eye with kohl for a divorced woman Interpretation of seeing eye makeup in a dream for a married woman When a married woman sees her eyes black in a dream, she suffers from anxiety and sadness. It is a good omen for the end of these sorrows. And a married woman suffers from accumulated debts, and she saw herself wearing black kohl in a dream. It is a sign of paying off debts and the beginning of a sense of comfort and stability. And if the married woman is late in giving birth and dreams of putting colored kohl on her eyes. It is a good sign of hearing the news of pregnancy, and God knows best. As for the married woman who sees herself wiping kohl from her eyes in a dream. This dream symbolizes an unstable married life, and God knows best. Seeing green kohl in a married woman’s dream. It is an indication of the goodness and livelihood that she and her husband will obtain. Seeing a married woman in a dream wearing kohl means good news for recovery from Disease and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing kohl in a dream about a man and its meaning. Commentators said: Whoever sees himself in a dream wearing kohl and his goal was to follow the Sunnah of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. It is a metaphor for his closeness to God Almighty and his readiness to follow the Sunnah of the Prophet. As for the person who sees that he is putting spoiled eye kohl in a dream. It is an indication of the pressures he is exposed to in his daily life and God knows best. And when a man sees that he is wearing it for decoration in a dream. It is a warning vision for him because he commits sins and forbidden things and he must repent to God Almighty. And the man who sees himself giving his wife black kohl is a good sign of the stability of the family in which he lives. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about eyeliner for a married woman The meaning and interpretation of seeing kohl in a dream for a pregnant woman When

title: What is the interpretation of seeing many dates in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing many dates in a dream? Eating dates is one of the ways of the Messenger of God, as it is the fruit that contains the most various benefits and nutrients such as minerals and vitamins. Its virtues have been mentioned in the noble hadiths, and seeing dates in general is good. And a blessed vision. Through this article on Net Encyclopedia, explain that you see many dates in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of many dates for a married womanDates are one of the fruits of the palm tree and one of the most famous fruits in the Arab world, as they are famous for their high nutritional value, as well as their great religious status in the hearts of Muslims thanks to the advice of the Prophet . God, may God bless him and grant him peace, ate it several times, and it is considered one of the visions that many people have, and here we look at the interpretation of a dream about many dates for a married woman: It indicates an increase in halal money and the achievement of desired goals. When the wife sees herself eating dates with her partner, this shows understanding. And mutual respect between them. A sign of happy days to come and events that await you in the coming days that you will be happy about. When a married woman sees a date in her dream, it means that her desires will come true, her pleas will be answered, or pregnancy will soon. It indicates that the married woman will enjoy an abundance of blessings And goodness.Interpretation of seeing a date in a dream for a single woman: Seeing dates is one of the visions that suggest a set of connotations and multiple meanings that can be interpreted according to the dreamer’s condition in his vision and the nature of the dream. Here is the interpretation of seeing a date in a dream for a single woman: a sign of stability and happiness that the visionary awaits in the coming days and a great advantage that will make her life better. A date in a dream represents the happiness that the girl enjoys and family stability between her and her family. When the dreamer sees dates in the kitchen of her home, this indicates precipitation. Rain in the coming days. It was said: Whoever dreams of eating a good date will hear good and beneficial words. Interpretation of a dream about dates for a pregnant womanDates or date fruit are plants full of elements and vitamins that are important for the health of the human body. Studies have shown that a pregnant woman who eats six dates a day notices an increase in Average cervical dilatation. A dream about appointments came to a pregnant woman: It announces the birth of a male child. It is also a sign of an easy and easy birth. Seeing a pregnant woman surrounded by dates on all sides indicates abundance of sustenance in the coming days. When a pregnant woman sees dates on a plate in front of her in a dream, this indicates her extreme fear From childbirth and the health of her child. I see the interpretation of a dream about a son who kills his father in Ibn Sirin. Seeing a date in a dream for a man, as dates provide the human body with energy because they contain sugars, and when a man sees dates in a dream, it refers to a group of interpretations that were given as follows: When a married man sees On a date in a dream, this indicates the presence of a woman who loves him and is loyal to him. Putting dates in the refrigerator in a dream is a sign of saving money and keeping it so that it can be used in the coming days. If one dreams that he is eating dates

title: Interpretation of breastfeeding a child in a dream

preview.html: How many women have wanted to have the feelings of motherhood that God naturally planted in their hearts, and today we will present some interpretations of this vision from our website gptafser.com/, so follow us. The interpretation of seeing an infant in a dream for a single girl. Whoever sees in her dream that she is breastfeeding a young child in a dream. It appears that He has no energy and is completely exhausted and has no activity. Seeing difficulty breastfeeding a young child in a virgin girl’s dream. This indicates that she is in a state of great sadness and is suffering from some distress. Because of the challenges she faced, they were great for her, which affected her peace of mind. Seeing herself breastfeeding in a dream is for a virgin girl. He will marry her soon after. Seeing many young children that an unmarried girl must breastfeed in her dream. It says that she is suffering from many responsibilities that fall on her shoulders. Which causes her a state of anxiety. And stress. Seeing an unmarried girl breastfeeding a young child in a dream from the right breast or perhaps from the left. It is a sign that her life will change or that she will acquire new things. If the young child is breastfeeding a lot of milk in a dream, perhaps it is a sign that she will get rid of crises. And the problems that cause her anxiety on an upcoming occasion. The good thing is to see a young woman breastfeeding from an unmarried girl. This dream shows that he will overcome the sorrows and difficulties that he went through. Breastfeeding in a dream is considered by the scholar Ibn Sirin, who believes that this indicates crises and adversity and the girl’s feelings. Upset. Seeing an unmarried girl breastfeeding a baby girl in her dream may mean that he misses love and wants to live in a state of passion, to satisfy this need, but he still does not find it easily. But Ibn Sirin believes that a boy is breastfeeding in a dream. It is just a sign of her marriage. Very close to someone you want and love. See also: Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding an adult. Interpretation of seeing a child breastfeeding in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a child other than her own, she is carrying him in a dream. It shows that he will receive goodness from God. A married woman who has never given birth before and dreams That she is breastfeeding a small child alongside her child. Good news that she will carry sperm inside her womb from her husband if she wants. The appearance of a young married woman in a dream while she is breastfeeding her. It announces that she will be happy soon. Because of the news that comes to her, it brings joy and happiness, but she will receive an abundance of During the separation of God. Interpretation of seeing an infant in a dream from a man and its meaning. If a man is suffering from an illness and sees in a dream that he is breastfeeding a small child. Good tidings of recovery and recovery, God willing. The appearance of a large number of small children and the man himself is breastfeeding them. It indicates that he will receive sustenance from God. The Almighty gives birth to righteous children and attains righteousness from them. Read also: Interpretation of a dream that I am breastfeeding a child who is not my son. The meaning of seeing an infant in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If a pregnant woman dreams of a child other than her own, then she is breastfeeding. This indicates that she will receive blessings and righteousness in her life and that she will undergo a gentle process of surrender, thanks to God. The previous dream may be good in...

title: Learn about the interpretation of debt or debts in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Debts or debts in a dreamMany people are looking for its interpretation, because debts are among the things that bother the owner a lot and affect his thinking. Rather, it is true to say that debts are humiliating during the day and they are humiliating at night. If these sayings are in our daily lives, then what about the correct interpretation of debts in a dream? It portends a deterioration in his life's affairs. We will learn this in our next lines. Debt in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Debt in a dream. Debt in a dream is one of the dreams that carries many interpretations and varies in the case of the debt itself, but in general, the accumulation of debt in a dream is one of the dreams that warns the viewer of being exposed to many problems in the coming period. However, if the dreamer sees that he is paying off his debts, the good news promises him that he will get rid of a major problem from which he suffered a lot and the beginning of a new period that will give him stability and peace. Mind - Objection. Seeing the dreamer symbolizes that he has many debts, and the creditor is asking him to pay those debts and he does not have the money to pay what he owes, a sign that the dreamer has lost his source of livelihood and is exposed to a difficult financial crisis. Seeing the accumulation of debts in a dream indicates that the dreamer is committing a lot Of sins and misdeeds, and he falls short in his daily duties, as he owes his Lord many of his sins, so the dreamer should approach God and stay away from Him, while He makes things forbidden. Debt in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing debts in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates that the dreamer is suffering from Serious family disputes, and the matter may develop into a rupture of kinship ties, so the dreamer should bring his views closer together and not get close to him. Accelerates. To judge matters so that these problems can be safely overcome. Watching the dreamer drowning in debt is a sign that he is drowning in a sea of ​​sins and transgressions, and he must reverse this matter and repent and seek forgiveness for the sins he has committed. Seeing in a dream that he is asking for more debt is an indication of the dreamer’s need. To support from those close to him and help them achieve his goals. Observing the repayment of debts in Manan is a good dream that brings many positive changes in various aspects of life, whether social, with the end of long-term conflicts, or the financial aspect, with the dreamer finding a new job. Also, recovery from a disease that the dreamer suffered from for a long time. I still cannot find an interpretation of your dream. Search on Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpreters. Debt in a single woman’s dream. Seeing an unmarried woman in debt in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will face many problems that prevent her from achieving her dreams, and she may be linked to an inappropriate person with whom she suffers from many problems. An unmarried woman drowning in debt is a sign that the dreamer has been carried backward by worldly matters and has fallen short of the rights of her Lord, so she must follow the straight path and return to her Lord. Asking an unmarried woman to pay off her debts is evidence of the woman falling short of her righteousness by making many decisions. Wrong and you need to correct those decisions to get rid of

title: Interpretation of mint in a dream: Seeing yourself eating mint in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about green mint for a pregnant woman Choosing to plant dry mint Fahd Al-Osaimi I dreamed about mint The interpretation of the dream of seeing mint in a dream differs from man to woman, depending on his psychological and social state at the time he saw this dream, but what no one agrees on is that the mint plant is one of the most used and loved plants. Plants used in the home, where they are placed in some foods and drinks, and help get rid of stomach pain. Interpretation of mint in a dream If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is inhaling the scent of mint or even eating or tasting it, this indicates the calm life that the dreamer lives and is full of stability. The dream of mint has more than one meaning for the dreamer, whoever sees it should know that changes may come in his life and he needs them. It is possible that this dream means for an unmarried woman that the wedding will come soon for her, or it is reasonable to indicate that the dreamer will make changes to his friends and those around him. The interpretation of the dream of mint for a single woman branches into many things, because seeing mint in a dream may indicate that the owner of the dream is uttering expressions that increase her status and indicate her culture and advanced scientific background. The dream of mint, which has many meanings as we mentioned, may indicate that the owner of the dream said words or gossip that annoyed others and aroused his displeasure, or that their subject was a source of annoyance or abuse. On the other hand, it should be noted that the dream of mint carries with it happy news for the dreamer, because the smell of mint is fragrant And it brings comfort and joy to the souls. Whoever dreams of inhaling the scent of mint or eating and tasting it, this vision indicates a calm and stable life for the dreamer. Whoever dreams of mint or eats and inhales mint in a dream may indicate some changes that the dreamer needs in his sleep, such as making an adjustment in his lifestyle to obtain comfort or requesting a change in the friends around him. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating mint or inhaling mint, his vision indicates that his owner has issued some expressions that increase his status and indicate his advanced culture and scientific background. Inhaling mint in a dream can indicate the conversation coming from the dreamer, which is a source of embarrassment to the person and offends him. Interpretation of mint in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing the mint plant in general at all times and in all situations mostly indicates the recovery of the patient, his health and longevity. If you see yourself buying this plant, this sometimes means that you will obtain a prestigious position or you will get money, and some imams have interpreted this as arming the forces with knowledge and benefiting others through you. But if you see that you are carrying a mint plant, but it is yellow in color, And God knows best, it may indicate that you are suffering from an illness, may God protect us, and it may indicate the emergence of some life problems. But if you see that you are drinking boiled mint, this has a connotation. If you are married, this means family stability and the end of disputes, and if you are single, this means that you will marry a

Inhaling mint in a dream could indicate the conversation coming from the dreamer, which is a source An embarrassment to a person and offending him. Interpretation of mint in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing a mint plant in general at all times and in all situations mostly indicates the patient’s recovery, health and longevity. If you see yourself buying this plant, it sometimes means that you will obtain a prestigious position or you will obtain money. Some imams interpreted this as arming the forces with knowledge and benefiting others through you. But if you see that you are carrying a mint plant, but it is yellow in color, and God knows best, this may indicate that you are suffering from illness, may God protect us, and it may indicate the emergence of some life problems. But if you see that you are drinking boiled mint, this has significance. If you are married, this means stability in the family and the end of disputes. If you are single, this means that you will get married soon.

title: Interpretation of brushing teeth in a dream - seeing brushing teeth in a dream

preview.html: The dream of cleaning the teeth of an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married or unmarried man, either by brushing with a toothpick, and more according to Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq. Nabul means brushing teeth in a dream. Brushing teeth means following the Sunnah of the Prophet, and if blood oozes from them, it means coming out of his sins and misdeeds. The brush is the interpretation of the toothpick because its purpose is the interpretation of toothbrushing in a dream. The toothbrush is a tool and means that a person uses to clean his teeth from food residue, when he wakes up from sleep or before sleep. To maintain the fresh smell of the mouth and also to protect the teeth from decay. The toothbrush is one of the tools that is of great importance to people. When purchasing it, they pay attention to many details such as the color, thickness of the brush hair, nature of the texture, and other details. However, there are people who do not disagree with such details, and therefore seeing a toothbrush for them is just self-talk and nothing more. A toothbrush in one dream. A single girl is one of the people who is most interested in using a toothbrush on a daily basis to maintain dental health and beauty. Therefore, seeing a toothbrush in a dream is a sign of safety and protection. It can also indicate harmonious, sound behaviour, commitment and discipline. However, seeing a toothbrush lost, lost or stolen in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of negligence in her responsibility, negligence in her religion, or wasting time and wasting it on trivial things and amusements. It could be a warning message. She tells her that there are people around her trying to set her up and trick her. It is also not advisable for him to see a dirty toothbrush, or see it broken, or placed on the ground, or lying alone. In the trash or burning it, it portends serious problems and issues that he will face. The best vision is buying a new toothbrush and also seeing an unmarried or unmarried girl receiving a toothbrush as a gift, this vision foretells that the unmarried woman will get what she wants and wants. A toothbrush in a dream The married woman: Seeing a toothbrush and cleaning it in a married woman’s dream is a sign that reflects the conditions of the children and the home and may indicate the condition of the married woman herself. Follow the morals of her children. As for seeing a married woman in a dream replacing an old toothbrush with a new one, this indicates an improvement in the standard of living and financial income for her or her husband, and the best vision is to buy a new toothbrush or receive a gift. From her husband, this vision reflects stability, tranquility, and family harmony in general. While seeing a married woman losing, breaking, or stealing her toothbrush in her dream is considered an unpleasant vision, because it indicates negligence in family duties and negligence in raising children. A toothbrush in a dream Pregnant: As for a pregnant woman seeing a clean and beautiful toothbrush that does not cause damage or bleeding to the gums, it portends that the pregnancy period will progress and the labor and delivery process will go well, God willing, and seeing our toothbrush
